AbsoluteLayoutData

public AbsoluteLayoutData(int posLeft,
                          int posTop,
                          int widgetWidth,
                          AbsoluteLayout.MarginPolicy margin)
Creates a new instance of AbsoluteLayoutData. The associated widget should be positioned at posLeft x posTop, and the initial widget width is widgetWidth. margin specifies how the margins of the widget should be expanded when the layout panel is resized.

This constructor is usefull to position fixed-width buttons in an expandable layout panel. 

 LayoutPanel layoutPanel = new LayoutPanel(new AbsoluteLayout(200, 100));
 layoutPanel.add(new Button("Cancel"), new AbsoluteLayoutData(5, 100, 
     50, MarginPolicy.RIGHT));
 layoutPanel.add(new Button("OK"), new AbsoluteLayoutData(145, 100, 
     50, MarginPolicy.LEFT));

Parameters:
posLeft - left position in panel
posTop - top position in panel
widgetWidget - initial width of widget
margin - margin expansion policy

AbsoluteLayoutData

public AbsoluteLayoutData(int posLeft,
                          int posTop,
                          int widgetWidth,
                          int widgetHeight,
                          AbsoluteLayout.MarginPolicy margin)
Creates a new instance of AbsoluteLayoutData. The associated widget should be positioned at posLeft x posTop, and the initial widget dimensions is widgetWidth times widgetHeight. margin specifies how the margins of the widget should be expanded when the layout panel is resized.

Parameters:
posLeft - left position in panel
posTop - top position in panel
widgetWidget - initial width of widget
widgetHeight - initial height of widget
margin - margin expansion policy
